message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 90/10 in my favor. I'm willing to negotiate if you have a better idea.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  Let's be more realistic. I propose 70/30.
I understand your need for a larger share, Bob. Let's try 60/40 this time. We both get a decent amount, and we can end this quickly.
Alice, we're running out of time.  60/40 seems fair considering the time pressure and the fact that the value of the money is decreasing for you.
